name: Slumber Party (singingstranger)
description:
My little experiment to learn how to use Bitsy. 

Even if the common narrative is now that being trans is no big deal, that is a privileged and lucky situation to have. Once you leave the metropoles and sometimes even there being transgender, let alone nonbinary, can be a big deal. 

You go to sleep over with your boyfriend in a little shack on the local playground.  The game is an experiment above all else - so go and enjoy!
